Description: FOUNDING FATHERS GERONIMO, SITTING BULL, CHIEF JOSEPH AND CRAZY HORSE Pocket Watch with a Thunderbird on the inside This beautiful pocket watch is a tribute to the Founding Fathers and our beautiful Southwest. The inside pictures are of Chief Joseph, Chief Sitting Bull, Chief Geronimo, and Chief Crazy Horse. Their names are written around the top of the watch. It is new and comes complete with a silver colored chain and clasp It has never been used. It runs by battery and comes in a beautiful gift box. The watch is approximately two inches across. It is a perfect piece to give or to keep especially for person who collects western items or Native American items We have included the cost of shipping in this item to anywhere in the United States. This way you know exactly what you are paying for this item. Please check our out ebay store to see the wide selection of southwestern items which we carry.
